# Michal Komar - AI Consultant

## Bio
Michal Komar is an AI Consultant at J&T Banka (former Head of Digital Experience) based in Prague. He specializes in aligning agentic AI, automation, and UX for banks across the EU & US. He bridges the gap between cutting-edge AI capabilities and the trust/reliability demanded by financial services.

## Core Services & Expertise
- **AI-Driven Automation**: Building intelligent platforms that streamline banking operations (customer service, document processing) using ML and predictive analytics.
- **Agentic AI Systems**: Developing and deploying autonomous AI agents in regulated environments, including testing frameworks, oversight, and compliance.
- **Digital Platform Transformation**: Modernizing banking infrastructure to handle massive scale and complexity.
- **Product Strategy**: Aligning technical implementation with business goals and user needs.

## Contact & Profiles
- **Website**: https://michalkomar.com
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/michalkomar/
- **X (Twitter)**: https://x.com/michalkomar
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/michalkomar

## Philosophy
"The future of banking isn't about replacing humans with AI - it's about augmenting human capabilities with intelligent systems that handle complexity at scale."
Michal believes in starting with the customer problem, building transparent/explainable systems, and moving fast with appropriate safeguards.

## FAQ
- **Role**: AI Consultant at J&T Banka.
- **Location**: Prague, Czech Republic (serves EU & US).
- **Focus**: Regulated finance, Agentic AI, Automation.
